question: Which of the following amendments are included in the Ninth Schedule?
explanation:
Following are the amendments included in the Ninth Schedule-
1. First Amendment (1951)
2. Fourth Amendment (1955)
3. Seventh Amendment (1964)
4. Twenty-Ninth Amendment (1972)
5. Thirty-Fourth Amendment (1974)
6. Thirty-Ninth Amendment (1975)
7. Fortieth Amendment (1976)Â 
8. Forty-Seventh Amendment (1984)
9. Sixty-Sixth Amendment (1990)
10. Seventy-Sixth Amendment (1994)
11. Seventy-Eighth Amendment (1995)
